info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 27 at 6:16PM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...A HEAVY SNOW SHOWER WILL AFFECT PARTS OF EASTERN COLUMBIA...EASTERN GREENE...AND WESTERN COLUMBIA COUNTIES... HAZARDS...A heavy snow shower accompanied by winds of up to 35 MPH which can rapidly reduce visibility to less than one mile. LOCATION AND MOVEMENT...At 615 PM EDT, a heavy snow shower was over Athens, or over Hudson moving southeast at 10 MPH. THIS SNOW SHOWER WILL BE NEAR... Hudson and Lorenz Park around 620 PM EDT. Claverack-Red Mills around 640 PM EDT. Claverack around 645 PM EDT. Philmont around 650 PM EDT. This includes Interstate 87 between exits 21 and 21B. SAFETY INFO... Conditions can deteriorate rapidly in winter weather situations. Be prepared for snow covered roads. Slow down and allow extra time to reach your destination. &&
